```{r, include=FALSE}
##--------------

# Core Variables
# [X] test_id 
# [X] redcap_event_name
# [X] mom3t_prepreg_bmi

core_vars=c("test_id","redcap_event_name","bmi_analysis_prepregnant")

# Table 1 CD-RISC 
# [X] cdrisc_score

table01_vars=c("cdrisc_score")

```

```{r, echo=FALSE}

dat.1=new_dat%>%
  select(core_vars, table01_vars, -test_id)%>%
  as_tibble()

```


```{r, echo=FALSE}

### Table labels

dat_label=dat.1

var_label(dat_label) <- list(cdrisc_score = "Resilience Score",
                             prepreg_bmi = "Pre-Pregnant BMI")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}

### Table generation

theme_gtsummary_compact()
dat_label %>% 
  tbl_summary(by = redcap_event_name) %>% 
  add_overall() %>% add_p(pvalue_fun = function(x)style_pvalue(x,digits = 3)) %>%
    as_gt() %>%
  tab_header(title = "Table 01 - Overall Scores")
```
